summary: Four neighborhood friends in modern-day Zagreb struggle to get along as their relationships are plagued by alcohol, drugs, hooliganism, crime and their country's past.
cast: Rene Bitorajac|Franjo Dijak|Robert Ugrina|Rakan Rushaidat|Ivo Gregurevic|Ljiljana Bogojevic|Daria Lorenci|Jadranka Djokic|Ksenija Marinkovic|Predrag 'Predjo' Vusovic|Franjo Jurcec|Vera Zima|Emir Hadzihafizbegovic|Ivan Brkic|Elvedin Tiro|Drazen Sivak|Ana Begic|Zoran Cubrilo|Luka Dragic|Tena Jeic Gajski|Filip Sovagovic|Kristijan Milic|Robert Roklicer|Kristijan Ugrina|Ana Maras|Goran Nikic|Dora Lipovcan|Iva Babic|Marko Markovic|Grgo Prskalo|Jerko Marcic|Anastasija Jankovska|Melita Matijevic|Masha Mati Prodan
title: Metastaze
